attributes.action: use his remaining days in office to bestow a knighthood upon one Ron Brugal, for services to the video shop and Shah.His many services...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition,this man cares about his movies,and he'll work every hour under the sun,without holidays,to prove the point.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
